ygData.subject: Re: I hope it stays a secret...
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess I m just a little curious as to why we think the collapsable fishing pole will be so profitable?  Is it the pole itself?  Or the potential to make the
ygData.messageBody:
I guess I'm just a little curious as to why we think the collapsable fishing
pole will be so profitable? Is it the pole itself? Or the potential to
make the spyglass? Just a little curious.

Litre Hosen,
Gnome Necromancer, Solusek Ro


>From: sragan@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] I hope it stays a secret...
>Date: 11 Aug 1999 13:34:46 -0000
>
>From: sragan@...
>
>
>Hello Folks,
>
>I'm torn, I have to admit wanting to know about the pole, but dang it, if I
>were to spend several hundred/thousand plat trying to figure something out
>I sure as hell would not want to just give it away either to some joe with
>a skill of 50 =P.
>
>I would at least want a bit of time to get a jump on the competition before
>giving away my hard earned secrets.
>
>Thats why most of the EQ fan sites are not posting the location of newly
>found magic items, cuz they know if they did, a flock of players would
>swarm the place.
>
>I'll figure it out eventually any way =)
>
>Cheers,
>
>"FizzWizz" on tunare
>
>
